name: Past Twelve
description:
THE GAME Discover the mystery of the Whitefield Street, an abandoned streets where ghosts still wander around. Play as Nick, to find out what happened to everyone, why and how they died.                     THE LORE     Whitefield Street has a dark lore. And the story just... happened. Once upon a time, someone had started murdering people, on this street, but no one could assume who it could be, but this... criminal is smart, and knows every way police can track him. But the real terror of the people there... started with a simple woman watching TV.                   ABOUT NICK Nick is not just an average man; he can see into the otherworld, and that can help him talk to the deeper spirits, which are the ones in the storyline.                 THE STRATEGY View into the otherworld to see what your next objective is. Usually, you need to find an item and ask a spirit about it, and the spirit will tell you a story. Learn about all the stories, and you shall solve the mystery of the Whitefield street.                  THE OPTIONS This game is different that others, it has more languages, including English, Spanish, French, etc. It simulates realistic sounds for almost every action. It has a storyline, and you go further into the story with every conversation you have with the spirits.
Planned release date: December 2022 Current State: Alpha Demo 1 Game's features that don't work in the Alpha Demo: Hardcore, most houses, spirit box in most houses, and other things. “The world is full of obvious things which nobody by any chance ever observes.” - Arthur Conan Doyle “Don't compromise yourself - you're all you have.” - John Grisham
